column1: '''Imram''' (The Death of [[Saint Brendan]]) is a poem written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and published in ''[[Time and Tide (3 December 1955)
The title is Irish for "voyage"; ''Imrama'' were Celtic tales about Irish explorers who sought the Land of Promise in the Atlantic.
A version of the poem appeared as part of "[[The Notion Club Papers]]" within ''[[Sauron Defeated]]''; the original version was also provided among the commentaries.<ref>{{SD
